text_block_list.name: Gentil's Father
text_block_list.text:
Gentil. Your power is already overwhelming. I've heard 
that at Tracen Academy, your strength has no equal.

text_block_list.name: Gentil's Father
text_block_list.text:
But sometimes I wonder. Why have you chosen to 
stay in that world? I've also heard that you've 
accepted a rematch with someone you defeated……

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: Aahahaha!

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
I must apologize, father. No matter how much I 
train and refine myself in that world――it always 
whispers to me, to become even stronger.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
……in the end, all that will remain is the body and 
mind of the strong. Races are the simplest and 
most spectacular way to prove your "Strength".

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: Huu-……! Huu-……!

text_block_list.name: Mid-rank Trainer
text_block_list.text:
……Verxina. That girl, she's switched to a 
more intense and heavy menu than before……

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: ……Is this spot open?

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: ……it's……all yours……!

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
I've already thrown away the person I was when I lost 
to you. All of my strategies, training menu, all of it.

――The day of Gentildonna and Verxina's race. 
The spectator seats were filled with Uma Musume 
and trainers that had heard the rumors.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
Aah……what good timing, you over there. 
Rookie Trainer-san.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
Would you record the time? 
All of it, until the goal.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
……――Are you more tense than yesterday? 
You went to the gym at noon too, didn't you?

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
Yes. Yesterday night, and this morning too. And up until now. 
I've been spending the necessary time in the necessary places.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
Next time, I won't let you get away. I'll run 
fast enough that you won't be able to get away. 
That's precisely what I've been training for.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: …………I see.

And then both of them take their positions in 
silence. It was a long, prolonged silence――

And then the silence was broken by the 
sound of feet kicking off of the turf!!

text_block_list.name: Gentil & Verxina
text_block_list.text:
Daaaaaaaaaaaaaah! 
Yaaaaaaaaaaaaa!

The two of them remain neck-and-neck, overflowing 
with fighting spirit, and each fighting for victory. 
The atmosphere was all consuming, and then――

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: Haa……Haaa……Kuu――!
――Gentildonna won by a nose.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: ………… ……what was my time?
At Gentildonna's words, I look at my stopwatch. The time was……

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
I see, faster than before. 
………………

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
Verxina, you've gotten stronger. However, I was able to become 
even stronger than that. That is reality, the unshakable truth.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: ――……Kuu, but even then!!

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
Even if that's the case…… I will continue to 
challenge you……! I'll figure out why I lose, and 
fix it, as many hundreds of times as it takes!

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
Until the day I surpass you! 
I'll still continue――……to seek strength!!

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: Very good!

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
That is how a racer should be! Even if you stumble 
and are covered in mud. Wipe yourself off, stand 
again and surpass the you from yesterday!

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
Continue challenging me, to become strong. 
To prove that you are the stronger one.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: Shave away all your imperfections……so that I can truly become the strongest.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
Our "Strength" is for smashing through the barriers 
before us. All so that we can accomplish what we desire.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
――And then I, with this body, with this 
power, will prove that I am the strongest.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
……I'll excuse myself here. 
From now on, be prepared.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: Yes. ……be well.

Gentildonna watched Verxina leave. A rival with the "power" 
to stand against her. She stood as a noble, towering above.

Was there a trainer that wouldn't admire that 
strength? Was there a trainer who wouldn't 
want to see where that strength would lead?

Even when I had returned to my room, my excitement 
hadn't faded. I wrote down all the training 
ideas that came to me, one after the other.
choice_data_list: I want to be……the one to make her the strongest
I want to be……the one to make her the strongest

text_block_list.text:
Gentildonna's action all were for the sake of honing 
her strength. Whether it be listening to my guidance, 
or inspiring Verxina to continue to fight.

……She loves racing. 
This world was full of rivals all competing to defeat her.

She wanted to match them, to compete, to stand side-by-side. 
And then, in this world, prove her overwhelming strength.

That's why she favors someone with "strength". 
To create a partner that would never falter―― 
all to bring out her own full potential.
……I reach my hand out to the shining lights in the ceiling.

I need to prove I have "strength" too. ……more 
than anyone else. Even more than her. I believe I 
have the "power" to draw out her true strength.
choice_data_list: To give her the "strength" to never yield
To give her the "strength" to never yield

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: You say you have a suggestion for me?
